metadata.feature_description: Navigate through paginated list of users with configurable page sizes

steps.expected: Users list displays with default page size of 10
steps.actual: Users list displayed showing 'Showing 1-10 of 15 entries' with '10 users per page' dropdown

steps.action: Click the Next page button (>) in pagination controls
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to page 2, showing 'Showing 11-15 of 15 entries' with 5 users displayed

steps.action: Click the Previous page button (<) in pagination controls
steps.actual: Successfully navigated back to page 1, showing 'Showing 1-10 of 15 entries'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to last page using Last button

steps.action: Click the Last page button (>|) in pagination controls
steps.expected: Should navigate to the last page
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to page 2 (last page), showing 'Showing 11-15 of 15 entries'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to first page using First button

steps.action: Click the First page button (|<) in pagination controls
steps.expected: Should navigate to the first page
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to page 1, showing 'Showing 1-10 of 15 entries'

steps.expected: Should display total count in format 'Showing X-Y of Z entries'
steps.actual: Total count displayed correctly as 'Showing 1-10 of 15 entries' on page 1 and 'Showing 11-15 of 15 entries' on page 2

steps.action: Observe the current page number in pagination controls
steps.expected: Current page number should be displayed and highlighted
steps.actual: Current page indicator shows '1' on page 1 and '2' on page 2, clearly visible in pagination controls

steps.action: Click on page size dropdown and select '25 users per page'
steps.expected: Page size should change to 25, showing all users on single page
steps.actual: Page size changed successfully. Display updated to 'Showing 1-15 of 15 entries' and '25 users per page' shown in dropdown. All 15 users visible on single page.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify pagination resets on filter change

steps.action: Navigate to page 2, then change filter from 'Authorized' to 'All'
steps.expected: Pagination should reset to page 1 when filter changes
steps.actual: Pagination did NOT reset. After changing filter to 'All', the list content refreshed to show page 1 users but pagination indicator still showed 'Showing 11-15 of 15 entries' and page '2'. This is a display inconsistency.

issues: Pagination indicator does not reset to page 1 when user filter is changed. The content refreshes correctly but the pagination controls show incorrect state (page 2 while displaying page 1 content).

observations: Page size options are limited to 10 and 25 users per page. The suggested test scenarios mentioned 50 and 100 options, but these are not available in the UI.
No explicit 'jump to specific page' feature exists - users can only navigate using First/Previous/Next/Last buttons or by clicking on visible page numbers.
With only 15 total users and page sizes of 10/25, testing with empty user list or single page was limited as the test data already fit within these constraints.
The 'Test with empty user list' scenario could not be tested as there are always users in the system (minimum: host account).
